description:
THE KING OF FIGHTERS now in chibi form!
Create teams of 3 fighters and aim for the top!

-Boasts a huge roster of 23 characters including multiple hidden fighters! They look stunning thanks to the colorful pallets!

-Add an extra layer of fun with the "MAKING" and create your own version of your favorite character!
*"DC MODE" are disabled

-Take on a friend in either Tabletop Mode or Handheld Mode! Find who has what it takes to be called the true King of Fighters!
name: KING OF FIGHTERS R-2
intro: First sold in 1999 for the NEOGEO POCKET, the massively popular fighting game KING OF FIGHTERS R-2 is coming to the Nintendo Switchâ„¢!
